  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114649</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114649</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Band structure of a semiconductor and an insulator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bandstruktur eines Halbleiters und der 
Isolierung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure de bande d'un semi-conducteur et d'un 
isolateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura da faixa de um semicondutor e de um 
isolador</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura della fascia di un semiconduttore e di 
un isolante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή ζωνών ενός ημιαγωγού και ενός μονωτή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura de la venda de un semiconductor y de 
un aislador</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the band structures of a semiconductor (a) and an insulator (b). The energy gap of a semiconductor is relatively smaller compared to that of an insulator.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">band structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy gap</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Insulator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">semiconductor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">valence band</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Bandstrukturen eines 
Halbleiters (a) und der Isolierung (b). Der Energieabstand eines
Halbleiters ist verglichen mit dem einer Isolierung verhältnismäßig
kleineres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les structures de bande
d'un semi-conducteur (a) et d'un isolateur (b). L'intervalle 
d'énergie d'un semi-conducteur est relativement plus petit comparé 
à celui d'un isolateur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as estruturas da faixa 
de um semicondutor (a) e de um isolador (b). A abertura de 
energia de um semicondutor é relativamente menor comparada àquela de
um isolador.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le strutture della 
fascia di un semiconduttore (a) e di un isolante (b). Lo spacco 
di energia di un semiconduttore è relativamente più piccolo 
confrontato a quello di un isolante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δομές ζωνών ενός 
ημιαγωγού (α) και ενός μονωτή (β). Το ενεργειακό χάσμα 
ενός ημιαγωγού είναι σχετικά μικρότερο έναντι σε αυτό ενός 
μονωτή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las estructuras de la 
venda de un semiconductor (a) y de un aislador (b). El boquete 
de energía de un semiconductor es relativamente más pequeño 
comparado a el de un aislador.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bandstruktur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieabstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Isolierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halbleiter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wertigkeitband</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">structure de bande</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">intervalle d'énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Isolateur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fascia di valenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
